content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(x)
Consists of steam engine (position x1), boiler (position y1), and offshore pump (position z1)

### Copper plate mine at position(x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x1) and a furnace at position(y1)
- Burner mining drill (position x2) and a furnace at position(y2)
- Burner mining drill (position x3) and a furnace at position(y3)

### Copper cable factory
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine at position(z1) and inserter at position(a) that puts into assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position b) that connects the furnace at position y1 to assembling machine at position(z1)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to crafting due to insufficient resources
- Ensure you have enough required items in your inventory before attempting to craft. For example, crafting an Iron Gear Wheel requires 2 iron plates.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it. 

### Errors related to inventory updates after actions
- Always check your inventory after performing actions to confirm that the expected items have been added or removed.
